name: Sheraton La Caleta Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from a week at this hotel, and it's almost fantastic - only almost, though. Like a lot of reviewers, we felt the hotel was let down by silly little things - lack of price lists for the Spa and menus for the restaurants was a big one. The 'information' folder in the room contains, you've guessed it - hardly any information. It DOES have a full page (repeated in several languages) telling you how great the manager is and how many different locations he's worked in - well if he could only apply himself to this hotel a wee bit harder it would be so hard to beat.
reviews.title: Fantastic but frustrating....

likes.liked: — hotel location, and quality of accomodation

reviews.title: Great rooms, nice pools- restaurants need improvement
reviews.text: On the plus side, the room was tremendous, big and comfy, with a fabulous en-suite bathroom - the shower is to die for! Breakfast (we were B&B) was sensational as well, huge choice and everything beatifully presented. All of the staff seem really friendly, but seem to be suffering from a lack of leadership at times - lunchtimes at the poolside restaurant were a headless chicken affair, despite huge numbers of staff around.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall the plusses far outweigh the minuses and I'm sure we would return.
reviews.title: Nice Location!

likes.liked: — I liked the spacious rooms with great views
likes.disliked: — A sewer smell at times could be noticed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed here last October and had a great time. The rooms are nice, the pools great and the hotel is located in a nice part of the island. We visited other areas as well, and it was awfully touristy. This area is nice, the promenade is lovely and the restaurants nearby (near lovely bay) are great.
reviews.title: Perfect for families, couples, friends, older, younger. Everyone!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: Only point of improvement- poolside restaurants are terrible value for money. The food is average and very small portions. If they would improve this it would be truly a great family hotel.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the 3th time we've been here, very good hotel! Staff is so friendly and they really do everything to help you.
reviews.title: Very good hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel and the room(s) are so clean, never seen this in another hotel, very good.
reviews.title: 13th to 23rd July

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: The only thing that is really really bad, the beds! Big holes in the mattresses and when you turnover, the bed is moving on the floor. These beds are no 5 stars beds :-(
reviews.title: Good Not Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed at many Sheraton properties we were not dissapointed in the hotel facilities.
reviews.title: Almost perfect for a hotel if you want a nice relaxing stay in the sun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: The rooms are spacious and clean with larger than average bathrooms.. A great choice for a relaxing holiday with superb gardens and pool areas.
reviews.title: I love this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We just came back from Tenerife, where we have spent 5 beatiful and sunny days. The Sheraton is a very nice hotel, reasonable size, so the pool and restaurants are at reasonable reach. Very near (10 minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport -avoid always of landing at Tenerife Norte, more than one hour drive), and also very convenient for golf lovers (Costa Adeje Golf Club is only five minutes drive). The pools are big and wide, and the kids area is well apart from the adults. The spa is very good as well. Breakfast is very good, with a wide selection of food, and particularly orange juice is a must.
reviews.title: Nice and comforteable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: As cons, I would say the following : there is no "beach" (no sand) as such (that is common throughout the island), although there is a nice pathway beside the sea to walk around. The pool cafeteria is too slow for lunch, but pizzas are excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent - value for money, absolutely!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: In general, a very pleasant stay in a very pleasant hotel, I would reccomend it better than Abama (and prices are better, even if they are not cheap).
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for the family

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have recently returned from this hotel and had an amazing time. The service, food and accommodation are definitely 5 star.
reviews.title: So good we booked to return in a few weeks!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will hopefully return next easter.
reviews.title: First time we’ve re-visited a hotel in 20 years of holidays, so that says a lot!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Sheraton La Caleta for a late summer break. What a fantastic hotel!
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel
Good rooms poor public areas
reviews.text: The rooms were beyond expectation with a huge comfortable bed, baclony with ocean view and a huge toilet area with a seperate shower and bath.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007
reviews.text: The staff were always very helpful and seemed genuinely happy to be of assitance.
reviews.title: Paradise on Tenerife, will definetly return!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The grounds and pool area were also excellent and very well tended to.
reviews.title: Watch your bill for over charges!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We also foudn the location of the hotel to be part of its charm. Far enough away to be extremely peaceful but within walking distance of most restaurants/shops. If you wanted to head into town it was a short 8 euro taxi fair and there is a taxi stationed at the hotel front door.
reviews.title: Shame about the service......

likes.liked: — Lovely bathroom, great spa, fantastic pools and grounds.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a 10 day holiday at the Sheraton. Our accomodation was booked through Expedia travel and was advertised as a "standard" room
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.liked: — The rooms, pool areas and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HOTEL
reviews.title: Delightful Hotel (despite the colour!!!)

likes.disliked: — The rather hemmed in balcony of the room we were given

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: First impressions were excellent. The communal areas were clean, bright and airy, the reception staff were very efficient and friendly.
reviews.title: Great for young kids and a relaxing holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool areas were lovely with a choice of heated and salt water. There were plenty of loungers and enough space for you to spread out and relax.
reviews.title: Great for a relaxing break
Mum had a great 60th Birthday !
reviews.text: There is access to the sea, however this area is very rocky and not good for sunbathing or swimming.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: We have just spent a very relaxing and enjoyable week at the Sheraton. The location is very good as it is a short walk into La Caleta which has a number of lovely restaurants although a car is useful to explore other parts of the island.
reviews.title: Would definitely recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the hotel are excellent, we opted for a club room with access to the club house which was well worth it as you eat breakfast in a separate area by the pool, get free soft drinks, afternoon tea and alcoholic drinks and snacks between 6-8pm.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The communal areas are very well kept with lots of different areas so it never feels busy.
reviews.title: Port in a storm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not eat at the hotel at night as it looked a little pricey however lunch at the pool restaurant was nice.
reviews.title: will return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: Would definitely recommend staying here when you visit Tenerife.
reviews.title: Amazing!!
Fantastic service
reviews.text: My wife and I have stayed twice previously at the sheraton la caleta and returned this week for a four night break. Upon arrival we were upgraded I assume because we had last stayed at new year in a club room on the fifth floor with pool and sea views, however the fourth floor room that we were given was on the outside of the hotel looking towards Adeje, the room was fine but the view a little disappointing after our previous stays. I went back to reception and mentioned that it was in fact my wife's birthday and our fist anniversary on the Thursday and could we possibly change to a pool view. The gentleman on reception obviously noted these points and moved us immediately to room 521 with great views. In addition my wife received a birthday cake at 6pm that evening to our surprise and then today after returning from breakfast we received a knock on the door, only to receive a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries for our anniversary, WHAT FANTASTIC SERVICE........we will return again soon, thank you to all staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a 6 night stay at the Sheraton and overall an excellent hotel well worth its 5 stars. Very difficult to offer any substantial points in criticism. We would certainly revisit without hesitation.
reviews.title: Top hotel resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a "superior room" that was very well equipped and spacious. Originally booked into a room with a view partly restricted by the restaurant / bar roof but we were offered a change on request as the hotel had some flexibility given that it was not quite full in March. No questions asked and very accommodating response to our request.
reviews.title: A high standard all round

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The buffet breakfast offered a very wide range of food - mostly very good but the hot items were not always quite as hot as they should have been. There were three restaurant choices within the hotel for evening dining.
reviews.title: quite excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were excellent - from the reception team, concierge, room attendants and poolside staff. All efficient and very courteous and welcoming. Poolside staff were attentive [unlike many hotels] and kept the pool area clean and helped guests move chairs etc and helped some less able guests in / out of the pool. Active lifeguard presence from late morning to end of the afternoon which was reassuring.
reviews.title: Very pleasant for a relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: We had an enjoyable long-weekend stay at the Sharton La Caleta in Tenerfie. The Private Balcony on all rooms was great for us, as we had a baby in a cot so could still enjoy a glass on wine on the balcony after he was asleep. It got noisy at night locally on the balcony, but we couldn't hear a peep once our balcony door was shut!!
reviews.title: Good Times at Sheraton La Caleta

likes.disliked: — staying just at the resort becomes expensive

reviews.title: Good Hotel - but not 5 star.
reviews.text: The room was big and spacious. The exterior facade was pleasant (although a painted concrete) it was very abstact and covered by trailing plants and was not a "boxed" type hotel as other in the area seemed. It seemed very pleasant especially sitting at the bar near the check-in overlooking the whole ocean and pool area. You could hear a pin drop hear!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff we excellent! The Spa was beyond excellent and relaxing. Some of the bar food was average and the buffet dinner is a bit expensive if you have a small appetite. The resort a la carte restaurants were much better for us in the evening as we didn't want to venture out to far. We hired the hotel baby sitting service and it was brilliant. They were able to send the same person for two nights and it was somebody we were already familiar with from the staff! Even better! And being able to eat out at the hotel and have a nice meal really put us at ease.
reviews.title: Has to be the best hotel in Tenerife
Excellent resort
reviews.text: The children's pool was great except that when wet it was easy to slip by the pool and this caused my 21 month old son to slip a few times when walking near the pool. Other than that they had great facilties for kids.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed at the Sheraton 8 – 22 February. The hotel in general is good, very spacious with good size bedrooms and bathrooms and friendly staff. Room service is certainly not up to 5 star standard; a bidet in the toilet but never a towel, sometimes you get face flannels, more often than not forgotten, we had to ask for towels on more than one occasion. The English speaking programmes on the TV are BBC World Service, CNN and Bloomberg - that's it. Small things I know but never 5 star standard. There are three restaurants, but only one if you are on half board and that’s the buffet one, the others you pay the price on the menu with a reduction for half board – very confusing and not very well explained on the welcoming letter. There are plenty of sun loungers around the pools and the heated pool was well used when we were there. We made the mistake of going over school half term, its not fun at breakfast listening to Mozart’s horn concerto on the hotel piped music system to the accompaniment of crying/yelling children, but the food is very good, go Club for peace and quite!
reviews.title: good value

likes.disliked: — lack of comfortable indoor space. The Foyer in the evening was very stark. Not a place you would want to spend a few hours in the evening

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here again in Sept 2012 (see previous reviews).
reviews.title: Excellent again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is excellent yet again.
reviews.title: A lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do not be put off by previous reviews about noise from film crews - we never heard a thing & our bedroom was above the main bar.
reviews.title: Excellent holiday - first class facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The good thing about the film crew staying in this Hotel is that they are gone all day from 7am to 7pm so pool areas are really quiet & peaceful!
reviews.title: Excellent, but avoid it next 2-3 months

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only criticism of Hotel is the lack of dining options at night, only buffet (€38pp) or Japanese options available but there are plenty of high quality Restaurants nearby so this wasn't a problem for us.
reviews.title: Superb Sheraton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012
reviews.text: Visited for 6 nights in Oct 2012, and overall still terrific. There seems to have been a management change, and a few minor tweaks to how things work but it didn't affect our stay (5th time!) and I'm sure we'll be back.
reviews.title: Still as good as it's always been

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others said, being used by movie crew but they were no trouble at all and absent all day.
reviews.title: Another wonderful holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The appearance of 2-3 restaurants across the road have hit poolside bar which is overpriced although bar prices definitely cheaper than 3 yrs ago...
reviews.title: Our 2nd visit - Beautiful Hotel !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.text: My husband and I have just returned, having spent 10 days at the Sheraton La Caleta - it was our 14th visit! We first chose the hotel, having read the Trip Advisor reviews. I have not added any comments myself since over the years but felt compelled to do so, having seen recent reviews.
reviews.title: Flawless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The grounds, staff and rooms are superb. We have looked at alternatives but other hotels seem to have sun beds in rows on concrete and cannot offer the amazing trees, plants, flowers etc. Even when fully occupied, there are always sun beds to be found and the pool staff are ready to help out with an extra umbrella.
reviews.title: good hotel good staff watch your credit card

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a 6 night stay in a Deluxe room at the Sheraton. This hotels ticks a lot of boxes for me when looking for a lazy holiday in the sun. Great pool area with plenty of seating available, bar and food service from your sunbed, good location on coast within easy walking distance to all the local amenities and restaurant options, relaxed atmosphere, night entertainment, reasonable food and drink prices, free computer lounge, spacious.
reviews.title: super hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are some things I would like to see changed, more comfortable cushioned sunbeds would be top of the list. We requested and booked a king sized bed and got two singles pushed together. We also somehow got in to an argument (in Spanish, my wife is fluent) on check-in with one of the receptionist about this and our room not being ready (it was 7pm), I don't think in a five star hotel the staff should be arguing with the guests whatever the reason. Excluding this incident though all the other staff we interacted with were very pleasant and helpful. The Spa is looking a bit dated, it could do with a bit of an overhaul and a hotter whirlpool. They charge €10 a day to have a fridge in your room, there is a mini bar fridge but it's design doesn't allow for your own supplies. Free wifi throughout the hotel would be nice.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It has so many things going for it and it is a hotel we really hope to return to, which is rare for us. None of its faults would be enough to take from the great stay we had but would add to the experience
reviews.title: Definitely returning...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent two nights here recently on our way to a holiday in Los Gigantes. We were very impressed with the courtesy shown to us by all the staff. We had requested a room with a sea view and sunny terrace, the first room we were offered had a very small closed in terrace, after asking for a change we we were show a club room on the same floor but with a large sunny terrace with sun loungers, there was a small supplement for this. We also opted to pay, just for one day, the supplement to use the club services this allows you to have breakfast in a separate much quieter environment, coffee, tea and soft drinks available all day in the club lounge and alcoholic drinks with canapés between six and eight in the evening - we thought the extra 50€ to be money well spent especially after experiencing breakfast the next morning in the usual restaurant - the food here was just as good but the restaurant very hectic and noisy. We ate in the Japanese restaurant in the hotel one evening and the food was excellent, probably the best meal of the whole holiday.
reviews.title: comfortable and free wi fi is available

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Would definitely return to this hotel, the location is excellent and the service is impeccable.
reviews.title: Perfect for a family holiday.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Where to start...
reviews.title: Sadly think this will be the last visit here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There has been a number of changes in the management/staff and the place has lost a lot of it's previous sparkle.
reviews.title: Wonderful resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival, as an SPG Platinum, I was informed there would be no breakfast or club lounge access as I'd booked on points. Apparently a new policy in place since March last year across the whole of SPG - clearly not true as I was in Dubai Grosvenor in Feb on points and had all access. Thankfully the management team made an exception before we booked another hotel, but clearly not a good start.
reviews.title: Ideal for a relaxing holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Asked for adjoining rooms which we were given, but one of the rooms - sea view, you were lucky to see anything due to number of pillars on the balcony.
reviews.title: Really very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012
reviews.text: Ate at the buffet - first time ever, and have to say it was shockingly bad, and expensive. Avoid at all costs as not worth the money.
reviews.title: Good but...

aka: Sheraton La Caleta Resort And Spa
description: The Sheraton La Caleta Resort & Spa, a new standard in 5 Star holiday destinations in Europe, with a sea front location, enjoy the sun in it's 284 rooms, Also enjoy the 3 outdoor swimming pools, mini golf and a beautiful subtropical garden. Gather with friends or family to satisfy your appetite at any of our 5 restaurants or lounges. Explore the Spa Eutonos a true relax getaway, cabin treatments, sauna, igloo and solarium.
